title: Why I can't see all my photos in My Camera folder?
content:
The thing is that when I open the My Camera folder I only see a few photos (recent ones) but not all the photos I have taken. However, I connected my phone to my PC and opened the Camera folder and I can see them  all. so:
Why I can't see them in  Google photos app at  My Camera folder?
How can I fix it?
